title: Theory of island biogeography - five islands

content.question: Five islands, A, B, C, D, and E, differ only in distance from the mainland, area, and species diversity. Which island would be predicted to have the highest species diversity?

choices.label: Island Distance from Mainland (kilometers) Area (hectares) A 50 1 x 102
Island Distance from Mainland (kilometers) Area (hectares) B 50 1 x 106
Island Distance from Mainland (kilometers) Area (hectares) C 500 1 x 102
Island Distance from Mainland (kilometers) Area (hectares) D 1,000 1 x 102
Island Distance from Mainland (kilometers) Area (hectares) E 1,000 1 x 106

content.answer: Island Distance from Mainland (kilometers) Area (hectares) B 50 1 x 106

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe patterns or trends in data.
